Text:
People don't appreciate how important it is to keep stuff like this alive.  I haven't looked but I would bet that there are many more seeders for, e.g madonna, or u2 or some shit like that.

Of all the downloaders, nobody has said thanks, so uploader, nuff respec, I'm glad the world has people like you. Thanks muchly for a great upload.
I'll say thanks. This album is big, too big to ignore. This is one of the great ganja-induced dub lp's from Jamaica. One love, one people, one pain...
